name: plantain
content:
plantain noun [C or U]
(FRUIT)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a tropical fruit similar to a banana with green skin: We ordered the guacamole with plantain chips. They ate grilled meat and fried plantains.
jrroman/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
a tropical tree with very large leaves that produces the plantain fruit: The area has been replanted with fruit trees, manioc, and plantain. Not one plantain grove survived the hurricane's destruction.

Fruit Trees
plantain noun [C or U]
(WILD PLANT)
a wild plant with wide leaves and very small green flowers: The lawn was full of plantains. Many weeds, including plantains and nettles, are food for a variety of insect larvae.
